SEARCH
Package com.example

Class Statics

java.lang.Object
com.example.Statics
public class Statics extends Object
The Statics class represents the statistics of a player in a game. It stores information such as the number of coins, last login date, number of continuous plays, number of wins, ties, loses, coins won, and coins lost. The class provides methods to read and write the statistics from/to a JSON file, as well as methods to retrieve and update the statistics.

  • Constructor Details

    • Statics

      public Statics()

  • Method Details

    • read

      public void read()
      Reads the statics data from a JSON file and assigns the values to the corresponding variables. The JSON file must be named "statics.json" and located in the current directory. If the file is not found, a "File not found" message is printed to the console.
